info.title: Vuci API
info.description: API documentation for accessing various router services and their configurations

get.summary: Returns multiple configurations of operator lists

put.summary: Updates multiple configurations of operator lists

delete.summary: Deletes multiple configurations of operator lists

get.summary: Returns specified configuration of operator lists

put.summary: Updates specified configuration of operator lists

delete.summary: Deletes specified configuration of operator lists

get.summary: Returns multiple SIM card status information
Returns specified SIM card status information
Returns APN values for multiple modems
Returns APN values for specified modem

post.summary: Clears SMS limit for specified SIM card configuration
Scans mobile network and returns available operators with details
Restarts connection of the specified modem

get.summary: Returns multiple modem SIM card configurations

put.summary: Updates multiple modem SIM card configurations

get.summary: Returns specified modem SIM card configuration

put.summary: Updates specified modem SIM card configuration

post.summary: Unblocks SIM card with PUK and sets a new PIN

get.summary: Returns multiple APN MCCs and countries

name.description: List name. Only used for easier management

mcc_mnc.description: 3 characters long code will select all operators with the corresponding Mobile Country Code (MCC). 5 or 6 characters long code will select specific operator code.

name.description: List name. Only used for easier management

mcc_mnc.description: 3 characters long code will select all operators with the corresponding Mobile Country Code (MCC). 5 or 6 characters long code will select specific operator code.

modem.description: Modem which the SIM card section belongs to.

position.description: SIM card section position inside the modem.

primary.description: Default SIM. Enables the specified SIM card as a default

deny_roaming.description: Deny data roaming. Deny data connection on roaming

volte.description: VoLTE (Voice over LTE) is a digital packet technology that uses 4G LTE networks to route voice traffic and transmit data. (Only available for devices with 4G modems)

service.description: Specify your preferred network type. If your mobile network is compatible with 2G/3G/4G/5G standards, you may choose the preferred network type to which the device should attempt to connect

category_lte.description: Network Category. In LTE (4G) only you can specify network category: LTE Cat M1, LTE Cat NB1 or LTE Cat M1 + LTE Cat NB1

pincode.description: SIM card's PIN (Personal Identification Number) is a secret numeric password shared between a user and a system that can be used to authenticate the user.

pukcode.description: SIM card's PUK (Personal Unblocking Key) is a code consisting of 8 digits that can be used to unblock your SIM card when you entered 3 times a wrong PIN code.

lte_nb.description: LTE narrow bands. Manual 4G NB selection

signal_reset_enabled.description: Enables modem operator connection resetting based on signal threshold

signal_reset_threshold.description: Signal threshold in dB for the connection. When signal is under this value modem resets connection

signal_reset_timeout.description: Wait this long in seconds before trying to reset the connection again

operlist_name.description: Operator list. Operator's code list name. You can get/add them in /operator_lists

sms_limit_num.description: SMS limit count. Disable SMS sending after limit value is reached

sms_limit.description: Period for which SMS limiting should apply (day, week or month)

period.description: Start day/weekday/hour. A starting day/weekday/hour for mobile data limiting period

modem.description: Modem which the SIM card section belongs to.

position.description: SIM card position inside the modem.

primary.description: Default SIM. Enables the specified SIM card as a default

deny_roaming.description: Deny data roaming. Deny data connection on roaming

volte.description: VoLTE (Voice over LTE) is a digital packet technology that uses 4G LTE networks to route voice traffic and transmit data. (Only available for devices with 4G modems)

service.description: Service mode. If your local mobile network supports 2G/3G/4G/5G you can specify to which network you prefer to connect to

category_lte.description: Network Category. In LTE (4G) only you can specify network category: LTE Cat M1, LTE Cat NB1 or LTE Cat M1 + LTE Cat NB1

pincode.description: SIM card's PIN (Personal Identification Number) is a secret numeric password shared between a user and a system that can be used to authenticate the user.

pukcode.description: SIM card's PUK (Personal Unblocking Key) is a code consisting of 8 digits that can be used to unblock your SIM card when you entered 3 times a wrong PIN code.

lte_nb.description: LTE narrow bands. Manual 4G NB selection

signal_reset_enabled.description: Enables modem operator connection resetting based on signal threshold

signal_reset_threshold.description: Signal threshold in dB for the connection. When signal is under this value modem resets connection

signal_reset_timeout.description: Wait this long in seconds before trying to reset the connection again

operlist_name.description: Operator list. Operator's code list name. You can get/add them in /operator_lists

sms_limit_num.description: SMS limit count. Disable SMS sending after limit value is reached

sms_limit.description: Period for which SMS limiting should apply (day, week or month)

period.description: Start day/weekday/hour. A starting day/weekday/hour for mobile data limiting period

modem.description: Modem ID that caused the error.
